publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-132 Tavish Scott: Bells Brae Primary School Golden Jubilee—That the Parliament congratulates Bells Brae Primary School in Lerwick on the occasion of its Golden Jubilee celebrations on Thursday 7 June 2007; notes the commitment of Mrs Margaret Rorie, Head Teacher, the staff, pupils and all who are involved in the school’s success; commends the school for its active role in the local community, and looks forward to Bells Brae Primary School being an essential component of Shetland’s commitment to educational achievement in the future.

S3M-132 Tavish Scott: Bells Brae Primary School Golden Jubilee—That the Parliament congratulates Bells Brae Primary School in Lerwick on the occasion of its Golden Jubilee celebrations on Thursday 7 June 2007; notes the commitment of Mrs Margaret Rorie, Head Teacher, the staff, pupils and all who are involved in the school’s success; commends the school for its active role in the local community, and looks forward to Bells Brae Primary School being an essential component of Shetland’s commitment to educational achievement in the future.
